StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetShipQuotaRqmtForRS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FiscalYear int, @CategoryCode char(2), @OrgID int AS
SELECT SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.MONTH_CODE, QUOTA_VALUE, REQMT_VALUE, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.SHORT_NAME FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN ON RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID = SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MONTH_CODE ON SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.MONTH_CODE = MONTH_CODE.MONTH_CODE WHERE SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RS' AND SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.CATEGORY_CODE = @CategoryCode AND SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND MONTH_CODE.MONTH_CODE > 0 ORDER BY RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ISOPEN DESC, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.SHORT_NAME, MONTH_CODE.DISPLAY_ORDER
